project_overview_info:
You can load projects you have already created from the list overview. You can also create a new project now.

Select and highlight a project from the list and then click Open Project to load it.
botn_st_01_hint: Here you can create a new project or open and edit an existing project.
botn_st_02_hint: Here you can create and manage main and supporting characters that play a role in one or more projects.
botn_st_03_hint: Here you can create and manage objects that are used in one or more projects.
botn_st_04_hint: Here you can create and manage places that are used in one or more projects.
botn_st_05_hint: Here you can create and manage storylines that are used in one or more projects.
botn_st_06_hint: Here you can write and edit your stories.
botn_st_07_hint: Here you can adjust the software settings.
botn_st_08_hint: Here you can find help and support for using the software.
botn_st_09_hint: Here you can find information about the software.

startWinInfoText1:
Thank you for choosing CSNova!

Codices Scriptoria Nova: books that are created in new writing workshops - in CSNova.
CSNova is an open-source project designed to help you organize and manage your creative writing projects.
You can customize the program to suit your working style. Furthermore, CSNova has a clear philosophy:
'You don't have to learn how the program works - the program should understand how you want to work.'

Before you get started, you can make some basic settings:

- Choose your preferred language.
- Choose a theme for CSNova to use.
startWinInfoText2:
You can also change these and other settings later in the settings.

Once you've made your selections - and are satisfied - click Save
You can restore the default settings by clicking Reset.
Or simply click Next to continue.
startWinInfoTextReturn:
Currently, you see buttons on the right side (= Navigation Panel) that allow you to access all program functions:

- Project Data: create a new project or open and edit an existing project.
- Characters: create and manage main and supporting characters
- Objects: create and manage objects
- Places: create and manage places
- Storylines: create and manage storylines
- Editor: write and edit your stories
- Settings: adjust the software settings
- Help: find help and support for using the software
- About: find information about the software
- Exit: exit CSNova

If you don't want to see this info text here in the Center Panel every time you restart, you can disable it in the settings. In the left area of this window (= Info Panel), helpful information and tips are displayed depending on the program function.

In the next step, you can create your first project - simply click on Project Data in the Navigation Panel
btn_save_hint: Here you can save the current settings.
btn_reset_hint: Here you can reset the settings to the default settings.
btn_next_hint: Here you can proceed to the next step.
